title: Ireland Recommends Covid Vaccine Shots for Children 6 Months and Older

opengraph.description:
There are currently reports, especially on Twitter, that the Irish Medical Organization is recommending Covid-19 vaccinations for children between the ages of 6 months to 4 years old. As TrialSite News reported, last year, Northern Ireland suspended their administration of the Covid-19 vaccinations for children between the ages of 12-15 without parental consent. 
Parents in Ireland Evenly Split About Vaccinations for Kids
